Describe the change and motivation.

## Changes

- [ ] Code changes

## How to test

Steps to validate locally:

```bash
pytest -q
python scripts/validation/test_system.py
```

- [ ] CI green on this PR

- [ ] Experiment artifacts (if applicable) logged to MLflow
